terms: put the top card of your clock into your waiting room
this card gets -1 level while in your hand
When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may put this card into your stock.
put that battle opponent into your opponent's clock
move this card to an open position
The character facing this card cannot move to another position on the stage.
put it into their memory, and your opponent puts that character from their memory on any position of their stage
